Articles.Content:
Even though .21 is just around the corner, we still have around a month before its out to play another community save!

However, this time, with a twist! Stock-players need not apply! Also, KSP-on-netbook players be warned..

Id like to include lots of mods in this, with a major focus on realism: The various historical and real-world packs, NP KW and AIES. Also, Mechjeb and ORDA, because im docking-challenged.

Lets pick goals as this picks up steam, but I want to test the waters, see who is interested, before we start planning in earnest.

Im taking suggestions, comments, concerns and what-have-you. Go!
No Idea how one of these even works... I'll, um, watch this one.
I'm interested but how will we agree on the same mods?
On this thread, I suppose. I posted this to be flexible, see which ones you guys are interested in including
What about B9, Mech-Jeb, ORDA, NP KW, AIES, Ummm, and some others?

What about B9, Mech-Jeb, ORDA, NP KW, AIES, Ummm, and some others?

Take out ORDA and NP and I'm good.

Take out ORDA and NP and I'm good.

I'm fine without NP, but why not ORDA? Of course, we'd be using the non-magic version

I'm fine without NP, but why not ORDA? Of course, we'd be using the non-magic version

Fine. Do you have a link? I can't find it anywhere.

Also can we add Kethane and KAS?

So far, we have:

KW, KAS, ORDA, AIES, Mechjeb 2.x, and Kethane (right? Is that what people want)

Adding to that, I'd like to add some replica packs, like:

Bobcat's Soviet/Russian pack, Bobcat's US pack, the community ISS, etc... Personally, I'd think itd be cool to assemble as much of the ISS as we can, in a similar order as to how it was done IRL, as a first goal. But again, im flexible and willing to see what people think.

A month before .21 comes out? Last time it came out five days after they said they entered QA, now it's been a week. I wouldn't be surprised if it came out by Thuesday since they don't work during the weekends.
So why is this in the obscure addon section? Back in my day the community sessions took place in the Spacecraft Exchange. Could a mod move it?
I vote FASA, gemini is awesome! Also its a smaller mod.
I originally had it in general discussion, I suppose a moderator moved it over here. Oh well, it's still getting some attention.
